verses.kjv: If it had not been the LORD who was on our side, now may Israel say;
verses.ct: If the LORD had not been fighting for us — let Israel declare this —

verses.kjv: If it had not been the LORD who was on our side, when men rose up against us:
verses.ct: if the LORD had not been fighting for us when people attacked us,

verses.kjv: Then they had swallowed us up quick, when their wrath was kindled against us:
verses.ct: they would have swallowed us alive when their anger burned against us.

verses.kjv: Then the waters had overwhelmed us, the stream had gone over our soul:
verses.ct: The floodwaters would have drowned us; the rushing current would have swept over our soul.

verses.kjv: Then the proud waters had gone over our soul.
verses.ct: The raging waters would have swept over our soul.

verses.kjv: Blessed be the LORD, who hath not given us as a prey to their teeth.
verses.ct: Praise the LORD, who has not let us be torn apart by their teeth.

verses.kjv: Our soul is escaped as a bird out of the snare of the fowlers: the snare is broken, and we are escaped.
verses.ct: Our soul has escaped like a bird from the hunter's trap; the trap is shattered, and we are free.

verses.kjv: Our help is in the name of the LORD, who made heaven and earth.
verses.ct: Our help comes from the name of the LORD, who made heaven and earth.
